channel.title: Posts on Laurora Dolly Art
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Laurora Dolly Art

item.title: Anya charm
item.description: Anya charm Lovely choker, great material and such a cute charm! The seller included an extra charm in my order, which was so sweet, and just as beautiful! The only word of warning is that this was a gift for a friend, and the choker it just slightly too small to fit around their neck all the way. This is easily fixed with an added clasp to extend the length, so it’s no trouble, just something to note if you have a slightly bigger neck!
item.content: Lovely choker, great material and such a cute charm! The seller included an extra charm in my order, which was so sweet, and just as beautiful! Regardless, the necklace is beautiful and I highly recommend it!
